content.section: Auto Tank (or Auto Basic) is a tier 4 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 45 with "Basic Tank". It features 1 barrel at the front of the tank body, and an auto turret in the middle.
- You can utilise the auto turret to predict where your enemy may be moving. There is a chance however that it is just shooting at a shape.

- Auto Tank is one of two tanks that is a sixth upgrade option, the other being the factory. - Auto Tank is the latest edition to the game, added in 2025, and released 2 years after Glider. - Auto Tank was the fiftieth tank to be added to the game, not counting removed tanks, with its ID being '57'.
